The plants are characterized by their striking, often colorful inflorescences, which are composed of a spadix surrounded by a modified leaf called a spathe. Neotainiopsis species typically grow as herbaceous perennials, often found in moist, shaded environments. These plants are noted for their ornamental value and are sometimes cultivated in tropical gardens.
